format.name: NCommasChecker
format.description: The argument value must contain at least 4 commas. The commas may appear anywhere in the value.

fn_schema.name: extract_product_information
fn_schema.description: Extracts detailed product information from a given product description text.

product_description.description: Detailed textual description of the product. The value must contain at least 4 commas, which may appear anywhere in the text.

include_price.description: Indicates whether to extract price information from the text.

fields_to_extract.description: List of specific fields to extract, such as 'dimensions', 'weight', 'materials'.
